languages.text: "Они бы исцелили мою душу, заставив тебя исчезнуть. Но я этого не хотела. Я... буду сама выбирать, когда идти с тобой бок о бок, а когда наши пути разойдутся. Свобода делать выбор, пусть даже неправильный и опасный — в этом мой Путь, {name}. То, ради чего я живу и за что борюсь".

"They would have healed my soul and made you disappear. But I did not want that. I... will decide for myself when to walk side by side with you and when our ways will part. The freedom to choose, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — that is my Path, {name}. That is what I live and fight for."
languages.original_text: "Они бы исцелили мою душу, заставив тебя исчезнуть. Но я этого не хотела. Я... буду сама выбирать, когда идти с тобой бок о бок, а когда наши пути разойдутся. Свобода делать выбор, пусть даже неправильный и опасный — в этом мой Путь, {name}. То, ради чего я живу и за что борюсь".

traits.locale_text: "They would have healed my soul and made you disappear. But I didn't want that. I... will decide for myself, when to walk side by side with you and when our ways will part. The freedom of choice, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — this is my Path, {name}. That for which I live and strive for."

The freedom of choice, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — this is my Path, {name}. That for which I live and strive for."

The freedom to choose, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — that is my Path, {name}. That is what I live and fight for."

The freedom to choose, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — that is my Path, {name}. That is what I live and fight for."

"They would have healed my soul and made you disappear. But I did not want that. I... will decide for myself when to walk side by side with you and when our ways will part. The freedom to choose, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — that is my Path, {name}. That is what I live and fight for."

languages.text: “他们本打算治愈我的灵魂，消灭你的存在，可我不想这样。无论是与你并肩前行，还是与你分道扬镳，我希望这一切都是我自己的选择。我渴望选择的自由，即便我的选择可能布满荆棘，即便我的选择可能是个错误，但那终究是我自己的选择，{name}。这是我为之生活与奋斗的目标。”
languages.original_text: "They would have healed my soul and made you disappear. But I did not want that. I... will decide for myself when to walk side by side with you and when our ways will part. The freedom to choose, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — that is my Path, {name}. That is what I live and fight for."

traits.locale_text: “他们本打算治愈我的灵魂，消灭你的存在，可我不想这样。无论是与你并肩前行，还是与你分道扬镳，我希望这一切都是我自己的选择。我渴望选择的自由，即便我的选择可能布满荆棘，即便我的选择可能是个错误，但那终究是我自己的选择，{name}。这是我为之生活与奋斗的目标。”

languages.text: «Habrían sanado del todo mi alma y te habrían hecho desaparecer. Pero yo no deseaba eso. Yo... decidiré por mí misma cuándo caminar a tu lado y cuándo se separarán nuestros caminos. La libertad de elegir, aun cuando la elección sea peligrosa y, en última instancia, equivocada; esa es mi senda, {name}. Para eso vivo y para eso lucho».
languages.original_text: "They would have healed my soul and made you disappear. But I did not want that. I... will decide for myself when to walk side by side with you and when our ways will part. The freedom to choose, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — that is my Path, {name}. That is what I live and fight for."

traits.locale_text: «Habrían sanado del todo mi alma y te habrían hecho desaparecer. Pero yo no deseaba eso. Yo... decidiré por mí misma cuándo caminar a tu lado y cuándo se separarán nuestros caminos. La libertad de elegir, aun cuando la elección sea peligrosa y, en última instancia, equivocada; esa es mi senda, {name}. Para eso vivo y para eso lucho».

languages.text: « Ils comptaient soigner mon âme et vous faire disparaître, mais je n'étais pas d'accord. C'est... à moi de décider si je souhaite continuer à marcher à vos côtés ou si je préfère que nos chemins se séparent. Cette liberté de choix, même si ce choix peut être mauvais ou dangereux, m'appartient. Il s'agit de ma Voie, {name}. C'est ma raison de vivre et de combattre. »
languages.original_text: "They would have healed my soul and made you disappear. But I did not want that. I... will decide for myself when to walk side by side with you and when our ways will part. The freedom to choose, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — that is my Path, {name}. That is what I live and fight for."

traits.locale_text: « Ils comptaient soigner mon âme et vous faire disparaître, mais je n'étais pas d'accord. C'est... à moi de décider si je souhaite continuer à marcher à vos côtés ou si je préfère que nos chemins se séparent. Cette liberté de choix, même si ce choix peut être mauvais ou dangereux, m'appartient. Il s'agit de ma Voie, {name}. C'est ma raison de vivre et de combattre. »

languages.text: "Sie hätten meine Seele geheilt und Euch verschwinden lassen. Aber das wollte ich nicht. Ich ... entscheide selbst, wann wir Seite an Seite gehen und wann sich unsere Wege trennen. Wahlfreiheit, auch wenn die Wahl gefährlich und falsch sein mag – das ist mein Pfad , {name}. Dafür lebe und kämpfe ich."
languages.original_text: "They would have healed my soul and made you disappear. But I did not want that. I... will decide for myself when to walk side by side with you and when our ways will part. The freedom to choose, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — that is my Path, {name}. That is what I live and fight for."

traits.locale_text: "Sie hätten meine Seele geheilt und Euch verschwinden lassen. Aber das wollte ich nicht. Ich ... entscheide selbst, wann wir Seite an Seite gehen und wann sich unsere Wege trennen. Wahlfreiheit, auch wenn die Wahl gefährlich und falsch sein mag – das ist mein Pfad , {name}. Dafür lebe und kämpfe ich."

languages.text: 「彼らは私の魂を癒し、あなたを消し去っただろう。でも、私はそれを望まなかった。私は…いつあなたと共に歩み、いつ私たちの道が別れるかは、自分で決める。たとえその選択が危険で間違ったものであったとしても、選択する自由、それが私の道なのだ、{name}。それが私の生きる道であり、戦う道だ」
languages.original_text: "They would have healed my soul and made you disappear. But I did not want that. I... will decide for myself when to walk side by side with you and when our ways will part. The freedom to choose, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — that is my Path, {name}. That is what I live and fight for."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは私の魂を癒し、あなたを消し去っただろう。でも、私はそれを望まなかった。私は…いつあなたと共に歩み、いつ私たちの道が別れるかは、自分で決める。たとえその選択が危険で間違ったものであったとしても、選択する自由、それが私の道なのだ、{name}。それが私の生きる道であり、戦う道だ」

languages.text: "Ruhumu iyileştirip seni ortadan kaldıracaklardı. Fakat öyle olmasını istemedim. Seninle ne zaman yan yana yürüyeceğime ve ne zaman yollarımızın ayrılacağına ben karar vereceğim. Benim Yolum, seçimlerim tehlikeli ve hatalı olsa da seçim özgürlüğünden geçiyor {name}. Bu yüzden yaşıyorum ve savaşıyorum."
languages.original_text: "They would have healed my soul and made you disappear. But I did not want that. I... will decide for myself when to walk side by side with you and when our ways will part. The freedom to choose, even if the choice is dangerous and wrong — that is my Path, {name}. That is what I live and fight for."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhumu iyileştirip seni ortadan kaldıracaklardı. Fakat öyle olmasını istemedim. Seninle ne zaman yan yana yürüyeceğime ve ne zaman yollarımızın ayrılacağına ben karar vereceğim. Benim Yolum, seçimlerim tehlikeli ve hatalı olsa da seçim özgürlüğünden geçiyor {name}. Bu yüzden yaşıyorum ve savaşıyorum."
